question: How would you rate the quality of instruction provided by the faculty?
How effective are the academic resources (e.g., libraries, labs) available to students?
How would you rate the cleanliness and maintenance of the campus facilities?
Are study spaces and common areas sufficient for student needs?
How inclusive and welcoming is the student community on campus?
Are there enough clubs and organizations that cater to your interests?
How would you rate the variety and quality of food options available on campus?
Are there sufficient dietary options (e.g., vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free)?
How would you rate the quality of on-campus housing?
Are the dorms/apartments well-maintained and comfortable?
How would you rate the ease of commuting to and from the university?
Are the transportation options (e.g., buses, shuttles) reliable and timely?
How reasonable are tuition fees and associated costs compared to the value of education received?
How satisfied are you with the availability and helpfulness of financial aid services?
How would you rate the availability and quality of health services on campus?
Are mental health resources sufficient and accessible to students?
How would you rate the support provided by the university for career planning and job search?
Are internship and job opportunities promoted effectively to students?
How would you rate the availability and quality of technology on campus (e.g., Wi-Fi, lab equipment)?
Are the university's technological resources (e.g., learning platforms) user-friendly and effective?
Are there sufficient recycling and waste reduction initiatives on campus?
Does the university implement energy-saving measures (e.g., solar panels, efficient lighting)?
How effective are the university's support services (e.g., tutoring, counseling, advising)?
How satisfied are you with the university's response to student feedback and concerns?
How would you rate the location of the university (e.g., safety, nearby amenities)?
Are there sufficient off-campus activities and entertainment options available?
How well-maintained and safe are the on-campus transportation facilities?
How would you rate the availability of parking for students?
